name: big-pearl
short_effect: Sell for 3750 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 7500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.black-white: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
